page.title: 15Mannington Farm
page.content: Mannington Farm has grown in both size and productivity since it was taken over by it's present owners in { 1960. At that time it had a small dairy herd of{22}head.The present owners have increased the acreage and improved the land,through buying neighbouring land.And land improvement to the soil through drainage and fertilizer,both organic and chemical.This has enabled the herd size to be gradually increased to {140-150}although under common market quota system the herd size is now working at {115}approx. For winter feeding of herd hay is mainly used.The grass over winter is fertilized with dung & chemicals,the grass is cut when tall in summer.The cut hay is turned and when dry baled & stored in barn.Barley & Kale are also grown,barley cut & stored kale grazed.
